rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Foyer
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with reception area, foyer leading to the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Grand living space with large windows and sliding doors opening to the garden for natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen; open plan design promoting family interaction.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Luxury home theater with acoustic treatment and ambient lighting for movie experiences.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with ample cabinetry, an island unit and a view to the garden through glass panels.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: spacious master bedroom with private balcony overlooking the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy guest room ensuring privacy and good ventilation.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Dedicated study area with a view of the garden for inspiration.

rooms.name: Utility Area
rooms.description: Storage and utility space for household management, conveniently located near the kitchen.

openings.details: Large, energy-efficient windows with adjustable shutters for natural light and privacy.
Glass sliding doors providing access to the garden and central courtyard.
Stylish, secure entrance door with a vestibule leading into the foyer.
